description: Nitro Games Oy engages in developing mobile game applications. The company is headquartered in Kotka, Etela-Suomen and currently employs 37 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2017-06-16. The firm creates products oriented to the mid-core user segment and focuses mostly on the genre of strategy games. The firm maintains its own platform NG Platform and applies minimum viable product process for market validation with new game prototypes after only a week of development. The NG Platform supports phones and tablets of all screen sizes. The Company’s product portfolio comprises such games, as East India Company, Commander: Conquest of the Americas, Pirates of Black Cove and Raids of Glory, among others. The firm operates thorough it subsidiaries Nitro Games Alpha Oy and Nitro Games Beta Oy. The company has a focus on the North American and Western European markets.
name: Nitro Games Oyj
